item.title: A Systematic Guide to Diagnosing Deep Learning Performance Issues
item.description:
Preface

Training deep learning models can sometimes feel like waiting for water to boilâ€”it tests your patience. When your model is training slower than expected, a systematic approach is key to identifying the bottleneck. Here is a step-by-step guide to diagnosing and fixing these performance issues.

Step 0: The First Check - GPU Utilization

Your first command should always be to check if the GPU is even being used.

nvidia-smi -l 1

This command provides a real-time view of your GPU’s status. The critical metric is GPU-Util.
